mapper.insert:
insert into tb_terminalonlinercd
f_terminalNo,
f_time,
f_state,
f_terminalSignal,
#{params.terminalNo}, null,
#{params.time}, null,
#{params.state}, null,
#{params.terminalSignal}, null,

insert into tb_terminalonlinercd (f_terminalNo, f_time, f_state, f_terminalSignal) values
(#{item.terminalNo}, #{item.time}, #{item.state}, #{item.terminalSignal})
mapper.update:
update tb_terminalonlinercd
f_id = #{obj.id}, f_id = null,
f_terminalNo = #{obj.terminalNo}, f_terminalNo = null,
f_time = #{obj.time}, f_time = null,
f_state = #{obj.state}, f_state = null,
f_terminalSignal = #{obj.terminalSignal}, f_terminalSignal = null,
and f_id = #{tag.id} and f_id is null
and f_id in(#{item})
and f_id >= #{tag.minId} and f_id < #{tag.maxId} and f_id like '%${tag.subId}%' and f_id like '%${tag.startsWithId}' and f_id like '${tag.endsWithId}%'
and f_terminalNo = #{tag.terminalNo} and f_terminalNo is null
and f_terminalNo in(#{item})
and f_terminalNo >= #{tag.minTerminalNo} and f_terminalNo < #{tag.maxTerminalNo} and f_terminalNo like '%${tag.subTerminalNo}%' and f_terminalNo like '%${tag.startsWithTerminalNo}' and f_terminalNo like '${tag.endsWithTerminalNo}%'
and f_time = #{tag.time} and f_time is null
and f_time in(#{item})
and f_time >= #{tag.minTime} and f_time < #{tag.maxTime} and f_time like '%${tag.subTime}%' and f_time like '%${tag.startsWithTime}' and f_time like '${tag.endsWithTime}%'
and f_state = #{tag.state} and f_state is null
and f_state in(#{item})
and f_state >= #{tag.minState} and f_state < #{tag.maxState} and f_state like '%${tag.subState}%' and f_state like '%${tag.startsWithState}' and f_state like '${tag.endsWithState}%'
and f_terminalSignal = #{tag.terminalSignal} and f_terminalSignal is null
and f_terminalSignal in(#{item})
and f_terminalSignal >= #{tag.minTerminalSignal} and f_terminalSignal < #{tag.maxTerminalSignal} and f_terminalSignal like '%${tag.subTerminalSignal}%' and f_terminalSignal like '%${tag.startsWithTerminalSignal}' and f_terminalSignal like '${tag.endsWithTerminalSignal}%'
